title: WW International CEO on COVID-19 Impact
itunes:title: WW International CEO on COVID-19 Impact
description:
Mindy Grossman, CEO at WW International, discusses handling the coronavirus pandemic and shares her thoughts on racial inequality. She says that the company's digital subscriber base is at an all-time high. Grossman also points out that moral leadership is essential for addressing racial injustice.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
